title: Sports-no-CBC
text:
Click on the video player above to watch live coverage from the 2019 track and field world championships from Doha, Qatar.

CBC Sports has exclusive live coverage of the 2019 World Track & Field Championships from Sept. 27-Oct. 6. Visit the stream and broadcast schedule, You can also add the complete event schedule to your calendar.

Action begins on Friday at 8:50 a.m. ET and runs through the entire 10-day event, including the opening ceremony, which is set for Friday at 3:55 p.m. ET.

Here are the Canadian athletes in competition on Friday in Doha (all times ET, and subject to change):
description: Watch live coverage of the 2019 track and field world championships from Doha, Qatar, beginning on Friday at 8:50 a.m. ET.
